title: CrewAI vs. AutoGen: Which Open-Source Framework is Better for Building AI Agents?
title1: CrewAI vs. AutoGen: Which Open-Source Framework is Better for Building AI Agents?
title2: CrewAI vs. AutoGen: Which Open-Source Framework is Better for Building AI Agents?
description: Want to build powerful AI agents but not sure which framework to choose? This in-depth comparison of CrewAI and AutoGen explores their strengths, limitations, and ideal use cases to help developers make the right choice for their agent-building projects.
author: Lina Lam
